name: Pettson's Memo
description:
Let's play memo with Pettson and his cat Findus. Pettson has made it extra challenging by creating six different game modes: Regular memo, Picture count memo, Math memo, Sound memo, Logic memo and the exciting Memo memo! Play by yourself, with a friend or against Pettson! With three different difficulty levels, the game suits children of all ages!

- 6 different creative ways to play memo!
- Play by yourself, against a friend or a computer opponent
- Fantastic original artwork!
- Kid-friendly interface!
- No in-app purchases.
